channel.title: pip on Andrew Blance
channel.description: Recent content in pip on Andrew Blance

item.title: jerryPycia
item.description: What a long strange pip its been… Grateful Dead have performed around 2500 shows. Remarkably, around 2200 of these have been recorded. To explore (most of) this data I have created a python package called jerryPycia. I think thats a really funny name. I’m also pretty happy with my “long strange pip” joke. You can install it using pip, like: pip install jerryPycia Its also available on my Github page.
